column2: [53,20] tathā bījasyāpy aṅkura-jananena rūpeṇa kalpitenāṅkura-karaṇaṃ pṛthvī-janakena ca tat-karaṇam iti vyavahāre 'pi tattvato naikasyāpy aneka-karmaṇi niṣedho bhedopapattir vā akriyaiva vā | tato vikalpārūḍharūpāpekṣayānekena rūpeṇāneka-karaṇam iti vyavahāra-mātraṃ na vastu | vāstavī ca cinteyam | tat kim anena vikalpitena, kiṃ tena rūpeṇānyena veti | vikalpe 'pi vānekenaiva visarjanaṃ vyavahāra-mātreṇa | na ca kaścid doṣaḥ |

column2: [53,25] dvitīya-pakṣas tv aneka-svalakṣaṇa-darśane saty upapadyate | na ca bīja-svalakṣaṇāni api sakṛd eka-saṃkhyā nirīkṣā-viṣayaḥ | na hy aparidṛṣṭa-bhūmani manuṣye kim ayam atra karmaṇi niyojyate naraḥ, kim ayaṃ veti praśnāvatāraḥ |

column2: [54,3] tṛtīya-vikalpe tv ayam arthaḥ syāt, yenaiva rūpeṇāṅkuraṃ karoti kiṃ tenaiva kṣitim iti | yenaiva sahakāriṇāṅkuraṃ janayati kiṃ tenaiva bhuvam iti | etac ca kadocyate yadi bījasyāṅkura-karaṇe nirjāte niyata-rūpaḥ kaścit sahakārī vyāpāravān pariniṣṭhito 'nya-karaṇe sandigdha-vyāpāraḥ | na caivaṃ śakyopadarśanam |

column2: athaivaṃ sati bījasyāṅkura-karaṇe pṛthvī-pāthaṛ-prabhṛtayaḥ sahakāriṇas ta eva kiṃ tasya pṛthvī-janane 'pīti vikalpārthaḥ | tenāpi nopayogaḥ | sarveṣāṃ sarvatra parasparaṃ sahakāri-bhāvasya suprasiddhatvāt kim atra praśnena | na cottaraḥ prabandho 'trānurūpaḥ | na hi tadāpi kāraṇa-bhedābhedābhyāṃ (22b) kārya-bhedābhedāv iti śliṣṭā kācit | tasmād īrṣyā-śalya-kadarthita-nirarthakaiḥ pralāpaiḥ param ākulayitum icchanti nyāya-vin-mānina ity alam atra nirbandhena |

column2: [54,13] api cāpūrvo 'yam asādhāraṇānaikāntika-kīrtana-prakāraḥ | vidyamāno hi bhāvaḥ sādhyetarayor aniścitānvaya-vyatireko gandhavattvādi-vad asādhāraṇo yuktaḥ | prakṛta-vyāpakānupalambha-balāc ca sarvathārthakriyaivāsatīti tat katham asādhāraṇānaikāntikī bhavitum arhati | asiddhidūṣaṇaṃ tu vaktum ucitam | tatra coktam eva |

column2: kiṃ ca, prakṛta-vyāpakānupalambhasya kṣaṇika-vat akṣaṇike 'pi sāmarthyānapāyāt kathaṃ bādhaka-siddhir ity asiddhir eva sarvathāyātā | śakyaṃ hi nitye 'pi vaktuṃ na sahakāriṇi sāpekṣasya karaṇam upakārābhāvāt | na nirapekṣasya, tena vinā karaṇāt | sthiraṃ ca bījam aṅkura-janakenaiva rūpeṇa kṣitim utpādayati bhinnena vety-ādi yadā visadṛśa-kṣity-ādi-janmopālambhaḥ pradīpo 'pi cākṣaṇika eva bhavatām | tatra varti-vikāra-taila-kṣayāv ekena bhinnena vā rūpeṇa kriyetām iti samānam | yas tu samādhiḥ sahakāriṇa eva bhinnāḥ tasya svarūpa-bheda iti, evaṃ ca bruvatā paro 'py ātmā ātmāpi para iti nivṛttedānīm ātma-parādi-śabdebhyaḥ pratiniyatārtha-pratyāyana-pratyāśā | na ca devadattasya svarūpaṃ yajñadattaḥ śuklasya vā nīlam ity ucitaṃ kvacid eka-karmaṇi vyāpāre 'pi | tad etad apetāgama-yuktikaṃ para-spardhayā 'bhidhīyamānaṃ niyatam upahāsa-bhājanī-karoti |

column2: [55,9] sahakāriṇo 'vadhīrya ca svarūpa-śabda-vācyam arthaṃ sahakāriṇottaram iti vyaktaṃ na tena nānyena vātmanā janayati sthiro 'pi bhāva iti niyatam anujñātaiva vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ | anyasyāpi hi sa evātmā janako na svayam iti na kaścij janakaḥ | tad ayaṃ sthirāsthirayoḥ sādhārṇo nyāyaḥ kriyā-niṣedha-sādhana iti | tasya dṛḍhatve sarvathā kriyaiva nāstīty asiddhir eva, antataḥ krama-yaugapadya-virahalakṣaṇasyāpi doṣasyāparihārāt | sthire 'pi kriyā-nivṛttir avaśyābhyupeyā | katham anyathā kṣaṇike kriyā-niṣedhābhidhānena kevalenāsādhāraṇatāpratijñā nivṛttim ālambeta | na hi sādhyād vyāvṛttir ity evāsādhāraṇatā | anyathā vipakṣād vyāvṛttir eva kiṃ nāsādhāraṇatvam ucyate, kim iyatā prayāsena |

column2: [55,17] nanu vipakṣād vyāvṛttyā sādhye niyamād dhetur eva syād iti cet | sādhyād vyāvṛttyā vipakṣe niyamād viruddha eva (23a) syād iti smānam | tasmād arthakriyāyā[ṛ] pratijñā-mātre 'py asiddhir eva | athānyena prakāreṇa ubhayor aniścaya-mātraṃ sattāyāḥ khyāpyate, tathā ca saty asādhāraṇatā yuktaiva |

column2: tad ayuktam | vyāpakānupalambho hy ekāntato 'bhāvaniścayakara eva katham aniścayaḥ | tatra yadi nāma kramādy-anupalambhasya nityāt sattā-nivartakasya dārṭhyamasaṃgatam, tathāpi prakṛtasya kṣaṇe nityatā-bādhanasya dṛḍhatvam abhipretam eva, anyathopanyāsāyogāt | tataḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgurāt kriyāyā ekāntikī vyāvṛttir eva vyāvṛttir asādhāraṇatāyāḥ | na hi gandhavattvaṃkutaścid ekāntena vyāvṛttam avasātuṃ śakyam | tad ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ

column2: [56,1] sthire 'pi vyāpakānupalambham apekṣamāṇo na sādhur asādhāraṇatāsādhane | sarvathā kriyām evonmūlayatīty asiddhir eva na sādhya-sādhana-bhāvaḥ | tasmād bāhyavedanaṃ bāhyavedaka-pramāṇa-siddhaṃ cārthakriyāṃ vastu-satīm āśritya vāda-prakrame tasyāsādharaṇatā-vādinā na sādhyetarayor ekatra vṛttir ekatā vyāvṛttir vopadarśayitavyā, kiṃ tūbhayatra saṃśaya-mātraṃ | na ca vyāpakānupalambhe saṃbhavas tasya | tasmān na sādhur asādhāraṇatopanyāsa iti sthitam |

column2: [56,7] syād etat | yadi bhinna-kāla-kārya-janmani janakasya svabhāva-bhedaḥ, tadā bhinna-deśa-kāryotpāde 'py eṣa prasaṅgaḥ | tad avaśyaṃ sahakārya-apekṣayaiva deśa-bhedaḥ kāryāṇām | na ca kiñcit-karaḥ sahakārīti kāla-bhedo 'py eṣām akiñcit-karaḥ sahakāry-apekṣayaivāstu | athopādāna-bhedād deśa-bhedaḥ kāla-bhede tu naivaṃ śakyam abhidhātum | kālāntara-janyānām apādānasya sthira-pakṣe tadānīm api prāpti-saṃbhavāt | tasmāt kāraṇa-bheda-rūpa-bheda-nibandhana eva kāryasya kāla-bheda iti cet, tad api nāsti, upādāna-sahakāri-bhedasya tattvato 'tāttvikatvāt | tāttvikatve 'py upādeya-saha-kārya-bhedena dīpāder upādāna-sahakāri-bhāva-bhedād aneka-svabhāvatā prasaṅgaḥ | tad ayam āropita-svabhāva upādānasahakāribhāva-bhedena bhedaḥ kāraṇasya kathaṃ kāryasya deśa-bhedāya prabhavet | yadi cāropito 'pi kāraṇasya bhedaḥ kāryasya deśa-bhedāya prabhaved evaṃ saty āropita eva kāraṇa-bhedaḥ kāla-bhedāya kāraṇāṃ paryāpta ity alaṃ tāttvika-bheda-pratyāśayā |

column2: [56,18] na caitad vaktavyam, yathā kāla-bhede yad yadā yaj janakam ity-ādi bādhakam asti na tadā deśa-bheda iti, etādṛśasya bādhakasya deśa-bhede 'pi vaktuṃ śakyatvāt | yathā yat yat kāryaṃ tat tad deśe yathopādeyābhimataṃ, tat-kāryaṃ ca kāryāntaram apīti || yad apīdam ucyate,

column2: [57,3] atha kāraṇasya vaibhāvābhyupagame syād eṣa doṣaḥ | tad-abhāve [23b) tu kiṃ kṛtam asya sarva-deśa-samānatvam | evaṃ tarhi deśāntare 'pi kāryaṃ na kuryāt, tatra svayam apravṛtteḥ | yogyatā-mātreṇa tu tad-deśa-vṛttim anapekṣya tatra kārya-kāriṇaḥ samāno 'sya deśaḥ upakārasyaikato 'py alābhāt | tasmāt tad-deśe karotīti na svāpekṣayā deśasyādhāra-bhāvaḥ kiṃ tu kāryāpekṣyā | ayoga-vyavacchedena ca tat-karaṇam | anyathā deśāntaravataḥ kāryasya karaṇa-prasaṅgāt | evaṃ tarhi kāle karotīti sa kālaḥ kāryasyaivādhāro niyamena | hetos tu sa cāsac ca syāt | ayoga-vyavacchedena tv eka-kāla-kārya-karaṇam iti kālāntara-vato 'pi kāryasya karaṇam avirodhi | tasmāt kuśūlādi-sarvāvasthā-samāna-svabhāvasyāpi tad-atat-kāla-kārya-jananam upapannam, bhinna-deśāneka-kāryārjana-vat iti |

column2: [57,12] tad etan na saṅgatam, bādhaka-bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ viśeṣāt | yat tu tat-kāryatvaṃ tad-deśatā-sādhanāyopanyastaṃ tad-viparyaya-bādhakapramāṇābhāvād asādhanam eva | anvaya-vyatireka-samadhigamyaś ca kārya-kāraṇa-bhāvaḥ | tau ca yathā tad-deśa-kārya-janmani dṛṣṭau tathā bhinna-deśa-kārya-saṃbhave 'pi | na caivaṃ sthitenāpi kāraṇena saha tat-kāla-kāryasyānya-kāla-kāryasya vānvaya-vyatirekau samānāv iti yuktam | kālāntare 'pi tad eva kāraṇam anuvartata iti na pratyabhijñāto 'nyat pramāṇam, sā ca dūṣiteti kathaṃ sthireṇānvaya-vyatireka-grahaṇaṃ kāryāṇāṃ kāla-bhedavatām iti nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ samānaḥ | tato viparyaya-bādhaka-vikalatayā deśa-bhede bheda-sādhano hetur yadi sva-sādhya-sādhana-samarthaḥ kim āyātaṃ tad-balavataḥ kāla-bhede bheda-sādhanasya | na hi vṛṣbhasyādohayogyatve dhenor api tatheti yuktam |

column2: [58,1] yadi viparyaya-bādhā balam asya na puṣṭāpi saṃśayam anullaṅghayantyā kiñcit, viparyaya-bādhā-vaidhurye tusaṃśaya-mātreṇāpi hetor viparyāsanāt kim aparam puṣṭyā | yadi ca tan-ātraṃ vivakṣitam, tadā viparyaya-bādhakena niraste 'smin kiṃ punar upanyāsena |

column2: tad apy ayuktam | yady api vikalpe pratibhāsamānau tāv upādāna-sahakāri-bhāvau bhinnāv iva na vastu, tathāpi vastunas tat-tad-vyāvṛtti-saṃbhvān nāvastava-vyavasthā, anyānyāpekṣayā ca na virodhaḥ | yathaikasyānyāpekṣayā pitṛ-putratvasya na vāstavatvaṃ, na ca virodhaḥ | na ca rūpa-dvayena kārya-dvayasya karaṇam, yena kalpanābhāsino rūpayor avāstavatvāt dvayā-karaṇam | yathā caika-rūpeṇa dvayā-karaṇaṃ tathā svopādeyaṃ sva-deśe paropādeyaṃ ca para-deśe karotīti upādāna-bhedād upapanno 'pi deśa-bhedaḥ yataś ca nāropita-svabhāva-bhedād eva deśa-bhedaḥ kāryasya, kiṃ tu svopādeyaṃ sva-sva-deśaṃ janayadbhir evārthād bhinna-deśaṃ sahakāryaṃ kāryam iti nyāyaḥ | tato na vikalpita-svabhāva-bhedād eva bhinna-kāla-kārya-karaṇam abhinnasya, bādhaka-sāmarthyena bheda-sādhanāt | ata eva na sarva-deśa-samānatvaṃ kāraṇasya | sva-sahakāry-upādeye hi sahakāritā asya, tasya ca kāryasya svopādāna-deśa eva saṃbhavāt tatraiva asya saha-kriyā-sāmarthyaṃ na deśāntara iti katham asya sarvaḥ samāno deśaḥ kutaścid upakārābhāve 'pi |

column2: [58,24] yac coktam, kāryasyaiva sa kāla ādhāro niyamena, hetos tu sa cāsac ceti, tad api deśa-sāmyena pratihatam | tathā hi yataika-deśasya eva hetur bhinna-deśāni kāryāṇi karoti, tathā eka-kālasya eva binna-kālāni kāryāṇi karotīty aprāpyaiva kārya-kālaṃ deśa-vat | tataś ca kadācij jāta-naṣṭo 'pi sahakāry-apekṣayā sakalakālakalitāni kāryāṇi kuryād iti sthāne saṃbhūyaikārtha-karaṇa-pratijñā-nirvāhaḥ |

column2: [59,4] atha deśam api kāryasya prāpyaiva jananān na deśa-dṛṣṭānta-siddhir iti cet | na puruṣāntarbhuvo jñānasya deśa-prāpter abhāvād dīpasya jñānādhikaraṇasyātmanaḥ pradīpa-saṃyoge 'pi na jñāna-sukhādi-saṃbhava-deśe dehāntaṛprabhā-praveśāvakāśa iti kāśa-kuśāvalambanam etat | yaś cāyaṃ tad-deśatva-sādhanas tat-kāryatva-hetur upanyastaḥ, sa na svatantraḥ, pratibandhābhāvād | bhāve 'pi nāsmākaṃ kṣitir ity uktam || na ca prasaṅgo bhavatum arhati, tat-kāryatāyāḥ pramāṇa-siddhitvena paropagama-mātrābhāvāt, viparyaya-paryavasāyitāvirahāc ca | tadā hi na ca tad-deśatvam atas tat-kāryatvam api nāstīti syāt, na caivaṃ śakyam śakyatve 'pi nāsmākaṃ mūla-prasaṅgayoḥ kṣatiḥ | na cokta-doṣaḥ, yato janana-sāmarthyam anyadā propagana-mātreṇaiva, na pramāṇāt | viparyaye ca ajananābhāvaḥ pramāṇa-siddhiḥ kṣaṇāntare tat-kārya(24b)-sāmarthyaṃ nivartayan jaladharasya anya-kriyākriyā-pakṣayor dvayor api kṣaṇabhaṅgaṃ sādhayatīti sapakṣe bhāvān na viruddhaḥ sattva-hetur iti ||
